issue.title: [CF 487] Mindcontrol debuff icon not properly finishing
issue.body:
I use an icon to show me when I get crowd controlled, similar to the addon Loosecontrol. Mind control is one of those crowd controls. However when I'm on my priest and mind control another player that icon also fires. Now even though this might not be quite the way it's intended, I don't mind it at all. After all a mind control cast by myself also kinda cc's myself. However once the mind control ends, for whatever reason, the icon doesn't go away. It always finishes its 8 second duration first, even though mind control might have ended 4 seconds ago.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #487 | Raw

comments.body:
Sounds like an event is firing at the wrong time, or isn't firing at all. I can't effectively look into this until addons are enabled in beta, though, unless /eventtrace actually works in beta right now - I have a feeling that it should be working, although it isn't the idea way to debug this, it will have to do since I don't have a priest on live and addons are disabled in beta right now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Well, it seems that UNIT_AURA is properly firing after MC fades on the beta, I'm just not sure if it is firing at the right time so that UnitAura will yield updated data, of it the bug has been fixed in beta and still exists on live.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Marking as waiting because I really have no idea what is going on here.

Just to make sure, could you post the export string of the icon that will reproduce the issue?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SEITHER ^SSort^N1 ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SCrowdControl;`Stunned;`Disoriented;`Feared;`Incapacitated;`Silenced ^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N51011^S`| ^Sicon^^

I have been trying to reproduce the issue in duels without luck. However the only way to cancel mind control in duels is with the trinket or voluntary cancels. In arena there are also interrupts and stuns etc. Given the fact that (apart from Seduction) Mind Control is the only channeled cc maybe those are events TellMeWhen doesn't check for?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Well, UNIT_AURA should fire whenever someone's buffs/debuffs change, regardless of what caused the change. It if isn't, then that is Blizzard's problem, but it is still something that I have to work around. I just don't know what the actual cause is or I would be able to fix this. I could take the atomic bomb approach and just disable the event driver for buff/debuff icons entirely, but nukes are usually a bad idea.
